# samsungcloudplatform_iam_groups (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "samsungcloudplatform_iam_groups" "my_groups" {
  group_name = "ViewerGroup"
}

output "result_my_groups" {
  value = data.samsungcloudplatform_iam_groups.my_groups
}
```
